Hi Karlo,

Jumping in on behalf of Joel. If the primary goal to reduce the plugin volume in general?

There are still some elements that rely on WP Bakery. We would first need to update those elements to be able to deactivate WP Bakery. 

ACF can remain deactivated in the event we need to transfer any older posts.

Hi Joel,

Can you please let me know if WP Bakery can be removed?

I suspect ACF will remain, is that correct?

Hi Chris/Joel,

Now that I'm fully on Elementor, can I please confirm if I can already delete ACF and WPBakery? Or should I just leave it installed but deactivated for now?

Thanks
Karlo

Hi Karlo, 

The requested updates have been completed, an overview is available below: 

Global Search has been updated. https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/find-a-clinical-trial
  1. To Exclude taxonomy (Please see the attached). Here are the list of filters (https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/admin.php?page=jet-smart-filters#/)
  2. The Other Demyelinating Diseases is working correctly. https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/find-a-clinical-trial/?jsf=jet-engine&tax=other-demyelinating-diseases:135
  3. Single Post repeater field has been updated. https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/relationships-between-objective-sleep-mental-health-fatigue-and-sleep-disorders-in-ms/
  4. Import/Export. I would suggest to do the updating once the pages/post are all done.
Please let us know if there are any further updates.

@chris Please see below

  1. Global Search has been updated. https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/find-a-clinical-trial
  2. To Exclude taxonomy (Please see the attached). Here are the list of filters (https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/admin.php?page=jet-smart-filters#/)
  3. The Other Demyelinating Diseases is working correctly. https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/find-a-clinical-trial/?jsf=jet-engine&tax=other-demyelinating-diseases:135

  5. Import/Export. I would suggest to do the updating once the pages/post are all done.

Hi Karlo, 

Sure thing, we'll work on these and come back to you with an update early next week.
hi @joel can you please check out Karlo's request below.

Hi Chris, Thanks again for the quick turnaround. 3,4 and 5 are all good. Please find below my feedback and requests in yellow highlights. Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks! Karlo 1. Global Search - https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/ - (Template) https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/post.php?post=10657&action=elementor Search result count display - can we display the number of results when they do the search/filter - "### search results"?
Filter - exclude some categories is it possible to exclude some items in the taxonomies/filter? Here's an example. Instead of having to delete the unused categories. It's not a problem with "Recruitment Status" since there are only a few categories. This would be helpful for the other Taxonomies with several categories.
2. Find clinical trial - https://staging-mstrials.kinsta.cloud/find-a-clinical-trial/ - OTHER DEMYELINATING DISEASES, this needs to be setup and all the post has to be manually set. Additional taxonomy - I created a taxonomy, added the 2 categories MOGAD AND NMOSD, and also created a smart filter to display on the left side bar. I've also updated the 2 posts that are relevant to this filter. Is this all I need to do? Single post How do I display the trial contents? 6. Import / Exports - Data has been imported to Jetengine. UPDATE - Now that data has been imported to jet engine - will it still be possible to export posts from the old site to the staging? In the last 3 weeks, I think Jo created/updated posts. I understand that this might not be possible because those old posts still have ACM fields. I'm sure its less than 10 posts, so not a problem if I need to do them manually. Hi Karlo,

Great to read!

The migration itself takes approximately 15-30 minutes and visitors do not experience any downtime during the push to live. We will standby for your instructions once you ready to go-live. 

I have also requested accounts to send your invoice. Please note, our team was able to complete the works in 12 hours (compared to the 16 quoted) and the invoice will be adjusted accordingly.

It's looking good Chris!

I'll do my initial review today before I pass this on to the rest of the team.

How long will it take to migrate to the live site? And will there be any downtime?

Thanks
Karlo
